casebody.data:
William L. BROWN
v.
Mark P. ELLIS. No. 389PA07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 6, 2009. Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, Lee M. Cecil, High Point, for Brown. T. Keith Black, William F. Patterson, Jr., Greensboro, for Ellis.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of January 2009 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Denied. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of January 2009."
